title: I got a 2 week ban for supposedly being "toxic"
body:
So, this is the chat log I had from a normals game. I usually play normals to relax from a stressful day and getting camped by a jungle/mid duo is not the best way to do so, especially when it's a level 2 twitch gank. I counted 4 ganks within 10 minutes. Who wouldn't get tilted? I understand that I should respect the enemy team, but don't you think that's a bit much and even so, that's hardly considered toxic compared to the people I've met in my games... Still, I continued to play. I have never rage quit EVER in the game and deserted my team, but I most certainly do get tilted like any other normal human being. So, I thought a little friendly banter would never hurt anyone.

Obviously after we won the game, the enemy duo: [removed] and [removed] had a few remarks in the end-game chat and I'm assuming they both reported me. I've had a few bad games over the past few years like anyone would, but the fact that I got a 2 week suspension and my seasonal rewards taken away over this particular game just doesn't make sense... If I was constantly flaming my OWN team, that would make sense (not implying that I flame at all), but I rarely flame.

I'm not asking for an un-ban and my seasonal rewards back (though I would appreciate it :D ), but I honestly want you to review my previous games and see if I really am toxic. Please take the time and  review the chat log of my past few games and just get a gauge at my behavior. If you truly deem my behavior to be "far below the standards of the League community," please post chat logs of me to justify your decision; I will respect the decision and accept my 2 week suspension and loss of seasonal rewards if so. Otherwise, with all due respect, I STRONGLY believe that I am not a toxic player compared to the people I have met in my games... 

If you could just take a moment to look at my past games, I would greatly appreciate it. :)

Thanks.

You told someone to kill themselves. What is your question exactly? Are you surprised?
When you say kys 3 times it is like saying beetlejuice 3 times....

Every game mode operates under the same rules.
It's not a game of "who's worse".

General name-calling and repeatedly telling others to kill themselves, the latter of which is why you got an escalated punishment. Also, it doesn't matter if other people behave worse; their actions do not excuse yours. If you retaliate then the both of you get punished. Next time if you don't have anything nice or helpful to say then just keep quiet.
Aside from the "kys" I have an issue with your name.

I have an issue with his name because I hate when people joke around with the term that I hear when I read his name. Game or not, I don't support when people say they raped the enemy. I don't support it as trash talk, and not as a name.

I would say you never had a friend that had experienced such or nearly experienced it, but I don't know you. I'm not going to assume I know you or the people you care for. I have had those I care for have to deal with that aftermath.

Do I? Yes, I find it offensive.
I've removed the names from your post, as naming & shaming is not allowed on Boards. I'll leave the thread open for discussion, however.

There are very few things that are considered worse, and most of those get you a 14 day or permanent ban as well.

As someone who has seen first hand what effect "kys" can have on someone with depression during one of their lows, I fully support it being an instant 14 day ban.
